title: Nigel Farage – 2022 Comments on Republican Disappointment at Mid-Terms
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nigel Farage, the former UKIP leader, on Twitter on 9 November 2022.
content:
Tonight is a disappointment for the Republican Party. The polls were wrong and the red wave is a ripple. Massive early voting has changed American politics.
